alert.note: Alert for Goliad; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 13 at 7:37PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Victoria and northeastern Goliad Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 736 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mission Valley, or 14 miles northwest of Victoria, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Victoria, Victoria Riverside Park, Schroeder, Victoria Mall, Ander, Mission Valley, Victoria Detar Hospital North, Weser, Nursery and Ball Airport Area. This includes the following highways... US Highway 183 near mile marker 628. US Highway 77 between mile markers 570 and 582. US Highway 87 between mile markers 796 and 810. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
